sentences.sContent: Can I borrow your pen for a minute?
sentences.sCn: 我可以借你的笔用一下吗？

sentences.sContent: They borrowed heavily (=  borrowed a lot of money  ) from the bank to start their new business.
sentences.sCn: 他们向银行贷了巨款来创办新公司。

remMethod.val: 借(borrow)钱不还， 债主心痛(sorrow)

trans.tranOther: to use something that belongs to someone else and that you must give back to them later
